entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The Headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as being criticized by Father and Malfoy.

entities.name: father
entities.description: Harry's father, who is critical of Dumbledore.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is critical of Harry and his friends.

entities.name: creevey
entities.description: A Muggle-born student mentioned as being liked by Dumbledore.

entities.name: colin creevy
entities.description: A Muggle-born student who is the subject of Malfoy's cruel impression.

relationships.description: Malfoy criticizes Dumbledore for being too lenient towards Muggle-borns.
Father disapproves of Dumbledore's leadership and policies.
Malfoy looks down on Creevy as a Muggle-born student.
Malfoy teases Colin Creevy with an imaginary camera and cruel impression.
